SEARCH
Package fang2.transformers

Class VelocityTransformer

java.lang.Object
fang2.core.TransformerAdapter
fang2.transformers.VelocityTransformer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Transformer, VelocityProvider
Direct Known Subclasses:
AccelerationAheadTransformer, AttractTransformer, RepelTransformer, SpeedAheadTransformer
public class VelocityTransformer extends TransformerAdapter implements VelocityProvider
Constant linear velocity TransformerAdapter. The velocity is stored as a vector and is used, during advance, to calculate the displacement represented by the transform.

    • setVelocity

      public void setVelocity(Location2D componentVelocity)
      Set the velocity using the given Location2D. The x, y components of the location are taken to be the x, y components of the velocity.
      Specified by:
      setVelocity in interface VelocityProvider
      Parameters:
      componentVelocity - the new velocity to set

    • advance

      public void advance(double dT)
      Advance one frame. The instantaneous velocity is the current velocity value; times the elapsed time it is the displacement.
      Specified by:
      advance in interface Transformer
      Overrides:
      advance in class TransformerAdapter
      Parameters:
      dT - elapsed time since the last call to advance
      See Also:
      • TransformerAdapter.advance(double)
